page.title: 12THE SCHOOL IN ABERNYTE
page.content: Abernyte is one of the 14% of rural schools in Tayside.It was built in 1906 of red brick.It replaced the old school which is now the school house. The school has two teachers and 39 pupils. There are 2 classrooms with a room in between them which is used for dining, gym,music and other activites. Advisory teachers of art,music.PE and craft visit the school monthly.A remedial teacher comes weekly.TSB savings are collected on Monday.The school has a partition which can be folded back into a big hall so that it can be used for Beetle Drives,Whist drives,Sales etc.,as there is no village hall.In the summer children come and play in the playground.Trees have been planted recently in the playgroud.The school is easily noticed by its distinguished red bricks.When you come up from the Dundee Perth road
